warlock.hud.interactable

Class Interactable

  • java.lang.Object
    • warlock.hud.interactable.Interactable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputEnabled, Renderable, Updateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InteractableColorButton, InteractableIntCounter, InteractableTextField, InteractableTextureButton

    public abstract class Interactable
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputEnabled, Renderable, Updateable
